PageTitle: radius-server group (Global CGN address pool view)
FuncDef:
The radius-server group command configures a RADIUS server group from which a dynamic CGN global address pool requests address segments.
The undo radius-server group command cancels the configuration.
By default, no RADIUS server group is configured for a dynamic CGN global address pool.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a RADIUS server group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the address usage of a dynamic address pool reaches the threshold, the CGN device requests a new address segment from the RADIUS server. When the address usage of a dynamic address pool falls below the threshold, the CGN device proactively releases idle address segments to the RADIUS server.
Prerequisites
The dynamic address pool has been configured.
Configuration Impact
After the configuration, the CGN dynamically requests address segments from the specified RADIUS server group and releases address segments to the RADIUS server group.
Precautions
The authentication username and password cannot be deleted if a dynamic address segment exists locally or if a device is applying for an address segment.
